name: HHCS
summary: Six low contrast dark colorschemes for happy hacking.
description:
Low contrast dark colorschemes.
    No bold. No italic. For very small font. (I'm using 7.5pts font in NotePC)
    Fullcolor gui only.
    Six variations with a feeling of unification. So it is easy to change hh<theme> by session, filetype, account, mood or "Today's Lucky Color".

    Try hhspring first.
install_details:
$ tar xvfz HHCS_<ver>.tar.gz
    $ mv HappyHackingColorScheme/hh*.vim $VIMRUNTIME/colors/
    $ vim HappyHackingColorScheme/htmltest.html
    :color hhazure
    :color hhorange
    :color hhpink
    :color hhspring
    :color hhteal
    :color hhviolet
